Text:
I'm sorry to say that the quality is poor; like an old vhs copy, or a bad cam-recording. 
Maybe for sentimantal reasons worthwhile, but not a nice show for my kids. Expected better, sorry.
Since it's NEVER been released officially on VHS or DVD, poor vhs copies are pretty much all we've got. Sorry to disappoint.
